labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: a box in the corner of the screen appears with the site as another window of the client without any interface
data.expected_result: The video will open on youtube in the user's default browser
data.short_description: the video link in a youtube embed opens up another small window that's part of the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Click play on a youtube embed - Click the "YouTube" text
